properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: JWT secret key for signing tokens. Must be at least 64 characters for HS256.

properties.name: jwt.access-token.expiration
properties.description: Access token expiration time in milliseconds. Default: 900000 (15 minutes).

properties.name: jwt.refresh-token.expiration
properties.description: Refresh token expiration time in milliseconds. Default: 604800000 (7 days).

properties.name: cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins.

properties.name: google.client-id
properties.description: Google OAuth2 Client ID for authentication

properties.name: profile-picture.storage-dir
properties.description: Directory path for storing profile picture files.
